title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - June 1st, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - June 1st, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Ben Steverman profiles the wealth detective hunting the hidden money of the super rich

-Bret Begun takes us behind the scenes in the battle for America’s most famous hotel.

-Tom Metcalf details how John D. Rockefeller was almost three times richer than Jeff Bezos

-Pat Regnier explains why Chinese tycoons are shunning superyachts

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
